p: All skin biopsy samples were sharp dissected and snap-frozen on Tissue-Tek (Sakura Finetek, Alphen a/d Rijn, Netherlands) in cooled iso-pentane (Sigma Aldrich, Zwijndrecht, Netherlands) and cryopreserved at −80°C. Tissues obtained from controls and patients with GVHD were also fixed in 10% v/v formalin and embedded in paraffin. Total numbers of biopsy samples included in the study as well as basic patient characteristics are listed in Table S1 in Supplementary Material.
